Murali Koppula

CV

I am an IT Professional with expertise in software engineering and development. My current focus and interest is in the areas of Blockchain and platform automation. I worked on major initiatives involving development, platform configuration, deployment automation, application and platform security, platform certifications, and proof of concept evaluations.
